root.index.json: Tile manifest with metadata, coordinates, and tags.

tiles.{tile_id}/voxel.json: Micro-voxel terrain data for this tile.
tiles.{tile_id}/fogmask.png: Alpha mask of player-revealed fog area.
tiles.{tile_id}/trace.json: Optional: tile activity log or memory trace.

maps.world_mesh.obj: Stitched OBJ mesh of exported terrain.
maps.world_overlay.svg: Optional: world overlay of labels, trails, etc.
